TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlBuilder extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Starts a URL editor that allows a user to select or create a URL. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method starts a user interface for selecting a URL.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time.
[!code-cpp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CPP/urlbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CS/urlbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/VB/urlbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string BuildUrl (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialUrl, string caption, string filter);

.method public static hidebysig string BuildUrl(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialUrl, string caption, string filter) cil managed
Public Shared Function BuildUrl (component As IComponent, owner As Control, initialUrl As String, caption As String, filter As String) As String

public: static System::String ^ BuildUrl(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component, System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ owner, System::String ^ initialUrl, System::String ^ caption, System::String ^ filter);
static member BuildUrl : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Windows.Forms.Control * string * string * string -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The whose site is to be used to access design-time services.
The used as the parent for the picker window.
The initial URL to be shown in the picker window.
The caption of the picker window.
The filter string to use to optionally filter the files displayed in the picker window.
Docs.summary: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.
Docs.returns: The URL returned from the UI.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IServiceProvider> interface is used to obtain the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation for the designer host.
